title: Preventive Maintenance - Bladder Inspection
description: Scheduled bladder inspection and heating element check for Tire Curing Press A1
notes: Bladder condition acceptable. Replaced two mold seals showing minor wear. One temperature sensor replaced due to drift. System tested and operating within specifications.

title: Corrective Maintenance - Load Cell Calibration
description: Load cell drift detected during master tire check - recalibration required
notes: Running full calibration sequence with master tire. Environmental temperature stable. All mechanical bindings checked and cleared.

title: Emergency Repair - Drum Bearing Replacement
description: Urgent drum shaft bearing replacement due to excessive vibration and noise
notes: Bearings showed severe wear patterns. Replaced both drum shaft bearings. Drum realigned and rebalanced. Hydraulic system serviced. Machine tested under load - vibration levels now within normal range. Recommend increased monitoring for next 100 operating hours.

title: Preventive Maintenance - Rotor Tip Replacement
description: Scheduled rotor tip inspection and replacement for Banbury Mixer E1
notes: Scheduled during planned production downtime. All parts staged and ready.

title: Corrective Maintenance - Extruder Heater Band Replacement
description: Zone 3 heater band failure - temperature control degraded
notes: Heater band showed signs of thermal fatigue. Replaced heater and associated thermocouple. System brought back to operating temperature gradually. Temperature profile now uniform across all zones.
